name: Steeze Reel
description:
A short demo made for Devtober, you control a skateboard in a mountain park. Skate around the level and collect as many pickups as you can! Can you make it to the end of the level?

Controls -

WASD/QE - Move the Skateboard

SPACE - Pop and Ollie

R - Respawn at last checkpoint

ESQ - Quit level / game
